mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 2276) for an order placed by Audrey Williams Enterprises for 150 two color jumbos (half sheets) imprinted and 12 three sheets imprinted for the Hank Williams Junior Show at the Texarkana College Auditorium in Texarkana, Texas, for New Year's Eve on December 31. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
